nodes.text: The Imperial Grand Medal of Resolution was an Imperial badge awarded to individuals who managed to "quelled the Rebel scum at the Battle of Restuss." It was slightly higher in rank than the Imperial Medal of Resolution, awarded to individuals who, while not directly participating in driving out Rebels, nonetheless maintained law and order within Restuss.

The Imperial Grand Medal of Resolution appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Because of the player-optional nature of the Battle of Restuss, it is unknown whether the medal was ever canonically issued.
